page.title: 06BRITISH GAS SECURITY
page.content: There is a British Gas compression plant on the Roxwell Road about a mile from the village of Roxwell. The security is very tight all the way around the place. Magic eyes are everywhere and some of them you cannot see. At the gate there is a speaker so you can talk into it and let the guards know who you are and your reason for entering the plant.There is also a video camera which looks down at the gate so the guards can se who is there. Even if you did manage to get over the fence two dogs would get you. Just in front of the gate there is a beam which you cannot see so when you walk through it an alarm goes off in the building. In case of emergencies there are two of everything, leaving one on standby.
